name: Halls and Walls gallery - summer ST.ART
name_original: Halls and Walls gallery - summer ST.ART
description:
An exhibition of artwork made by 2020 UT Summer ST.ART students.

For artist names and artwork info, see: https://www.hallsandwallsgal.com

Works best on Google Chrome https://www.google.com/chrome/

Navigate with your  W A S D keys. 

Press ESC to regain control of mouse.

Produced by Katy McCarthy
